to_module_hom_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
@[simp]
theorem to_module_hom_apply (x : L) (m : M) : to_module_hom R L M («expr ⊗ₜ » x m) = «expr⁅ , ⁆» x m := by
  simp only [to_module_hom, tensor_product.lie_module.lift_lie_apply, to_endomorphism_apply_apply,
    lie_hom.coe_to_linear_map, lie_module_hom.coe_mk, linear_map.coe_mk, linear_map.to_fun_eq_coe]
#align to_module_hom_apply to_module_hom_apply
map_tmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem map_tmul (f : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » M R L P) (g : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » N R L Q) (m : M) (n : N) :
    map f g («expr ⊗ₜ » m n) = «expr ⊗ₜ » (f m) (g n) :=
  map_tmul f g m n
#align map_tmul map_tmul
map_incl_def:
@[simp]
theorem map_incl_def (M' : lie_submodule R L M) (N' : lie_submodule R L N) : map_incl M' N' = map M'.incl N'.incl :=
  rfl
#align map_incl_def map_incl_def
lift_lie_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
theorem lift_lie_apply (f : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » M R L («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (m : M) (n : N) :
    lift_lie R L M N P f («expr ⊗ₜ » m n) = f m n := by
  simp only [coe_lift_lie_eq_lift_coe, lie_module_hom.coe_to_linear_map, lift_apply]
#align lift_lie_apply lift_lie_apply
lift_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem lift_apply (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (m : M) (n : N) :
    lift R L M N P f («expr ⊗ₜ » m n) = f m n :=
  rfl
#align lift_apply lift_apply
lie_tmul_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/

/-

@[simp]
theorem lie_tmul_right (x : L) (m : M) (n : N) :
    «expr⁅ , ⁆» x («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » m R n) = «expr ⊗ₜ » («expr⁅ , ⁆» x m) n + «expr ⊗ₜ » m («expr⁅ , ⁆» x n) :=
  show has_bracket_aux x («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » m R n) = _ by
    simp only [has_bracket_aux, linear_map.rtensor_tmul, to_endomorphism_apply_apply, linear_map.add_apply,
      linear_map.ltensor_tmul]
#align lie_tmul_right lie_tmul_right
lie_ideal_oper_eq_tensor_map_range:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product.infer -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr↥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr↥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product.infer -/
/-- A useful alternative characterisation of Lie ideal operations on Lie submodules.

Given a Lie ideal `I ⊆ L` and a Lie submodule `N ⊆ M`, by tensoring the inclusion maps and then
applying the action of `L` on `M`, we obtain morphism of Lie modules `f : I ⊗ N → L ⊗ M → M`.

This lemma states that `⁅I, N⁆ = range f`. -/
theorem lie_ideal_oper_eq_tensor_map_range :
    «expr⁅ , ⁆» I N =
      ((to_module_hom R L M).comp
          (map_incl I N :
            «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » (tensor_product.infer («expr↥ » I) («expr↥ » N)) R L (tensor_product.infer L M))).range :=
  by
  rw [← coe_to_submodule_eq_iff, lie_ideal_oper_eq_linear_span, lie_module_hom.coe_submodule_range,
    lie_module_hom.coe_linear_map_comp, linear_map.range_comp, map_incl_def, coe_linear_map_map,
    tensor_product.map_range_eq_span_tmul, submodule.map_span]
  congr ; ext m; constructor
  · rintro ⟨⟨x, hx⟩, ⟨n, hn⟩, rfl⟩
    use «expr ⊗ₜ » x n
    constructor
    · use ⟨x, hx⟩, ⟨n, hn⟩
      simp
    · simp
  · rintro ⟨t, ⟨⟨x, hx⟩, ⟨n, hn⟩, rfl⟩, h⟩
    rw [← h]
    use ⟨x, hx⟩, ⟨n, hn⟩
    simp
#align lie_ideal_oper_eq_tensor_map_range lie_ideal_oper_eq_tensor_map_range
coe_linear_map_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_linear_map_map (f : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » M R L P) (g : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » N R L Q) :
    (map f g : «expr →ₗ[ ] » (tensor_product M R N) R (tensor_product P R Q)) =
      tensor_product.map (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R P) (g : «expr →ₗ[ ] » N R Q) :=
  rfl
#align coe_linear_map_map coe_linear_map_map
coe_lift_lie_eq_lift_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_lift_lie_eq_lift_coe (f : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » M R L («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) :
    «expr⇑ » (lift_lie R L M N P f) = lift R L M N P f :=
  by
  suffices (lift_lie R L M N P f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » (tensor_product M R N) R P) = lift R L M N P f by
    rw [← this, lie_module_hom.coe_to_linear_map]
  ext (m n)
  simp only [lift_lie, linear_equiv.trans_apply, lie_module_equiv.coe_to_linear_equiv,
    coe_linear_map_max_triv_linear_map_equiv_lie_module_hom, coe_max_triv_equiv_apply,
    coe_linear_map_max_triv_linear_map_equiv_lie_module_hom_symm]
#align coe_lift_lie_eq_lift_coe coe_lift_lie_eq_lift_coe
